item.title: Trump says he signed Epstein bill

item.title: CMA Awards 2025: Lainey Wilson, Megan Moroney and more hit the red carpet
item.description: Country music's biggest stars stepped out at Nashville's Bridgestone Arena on Nov. 19.

item.title: WATCH: Accused wife killer pleads guilty to disposal of body
item.description: A Massachusetts man accused of killing and dismembering his wife in 2023 has pleaded guilty to disposing her body.

item.title: WATCH: Tourist blamed for massive fire at historic Chinese temple site
item.description: Footage shows flames engulfing a pavilion at the Yongqing Temple complex in China, sending smoke into the sky. Chinese state media reported the blaze ...

item.title: Dick Cheney funeral: Biden to attend, Bush to deliver tribute
item.description: Former Vice President Dick Cheney's funeral is being held Thursday in Washington. Former President Joe Biden plans to attend, a spokesperson confirmed...
